paragraphs.text:
val project = "DA"

val maxDigX = 3
val maxDigY = 84
val regDateFrom = LocalDate.parse("2018-03-01")
val regDateTo = LocalDate.parse("2018-05-31")
val payDateTo = regDateTo.plusDays(maxDigY + 1)

val dims = Seq("player_id", "register_platform", "register_date", "source", "country", "tier", "is_us")
val hiveSchema = "vgregor"
val hiveTable = "ga_972_payer_dataset_v0"

// dx - interval of days [0, maxDigX]
// dy - interval of days (maxDigX, maxDigY]

msg.data:
project: String = DA
maxDigX: Int = 3
maxDigY: Int = 84
regDateFrom: org.joda.time.LocalDate = 2018-03-01
regDateTo: org.joda.time.LocalDate = 2018-05-31
payDateTo: org.joda.time.LocalDate = 2018-08-24
dims: Seq[String] = List(player_id, register_platform, register_date, source, country, tier, is_us)
hiveSchema: String = vgregor
hiveTable: String = ga_972_payer_dataset_v0

paragraphs.text:
val tier = sqlContext.table("dwh.country_tiers")
    .filter($"project" === project)
    .filter($"quarter" === getQuarterFromMonth(payDateTo.getMonthOfYear()))
    .filter($"year" === payDateTo.getYear())
    .select(
        $"country_code".as("country"),
        $"tier"
    )

val attr = getLastValidAttribution(project, payDateTo)(sqlContext, sc)
    .select(
        $"player_id",
        $"source"
    )

val prof = getProfiles(project)(sqlContext)
    .join(
        getUserType(project)(sqlContext)
            .select($"player_id", $"user_type")
            .filter($"user_type" !== "user"),
        Seq("player_id"),
        "left"
    )
    .filter($"user_type".isNull)
    .drop("user_type")
    .withColumn("register_date", to_date($"register_time"))
    .filter($"register_date" >= regDateFrom.toString)
    .filter($"register_date" <= regDateTo.toString)
    .withColumn("is_us", $"country" === "US")
    .join(attr, Seq("player_id"), "left")
    .join(tier, Seq("country"), "left")
    .withColumn("tier", when($"tier".isNull, lit("4")).otherwise($"tier"))
    .select(dims ++ Seq("register_time") map col:_*)

val pay = sqlContext.table(project.toLowerCase ++ "_bckp.monetization")
    .select(
        $"player_id",
        $"create_time",
        $"order_item_id",
        $"eur_netto"
    )
    .join(prof, Seq("player_id"), "left")
    .filter($"register_date".isNotNull)
    .withColumn("days_in_game", getDaysBetween.udf($"register_time", $"create_time"))
    .filter($"days_in_game" <= maxDigY)
    .select(
        dims ++ 
        Seq(
            "create_time",
            "days_in_game",
            "order_item_id",
            "eur_netto"
        ) map col:_*
    )

val payGrp = pay.groupBy(dims map col:_*)
    .agg(
        count(when($"days_in_game" <= maxDigX, $"player_id").otherwise(lit(null))).as("dx_pay_count"),
        count(when($"days_in_game" > maxDigX, $"player_id").otherwise(lit(null))).as("dy_pay_count")
    )
    .withColumn("dx_payer", $"dx_pay_count" > 0)
    .withColumn("dy_payer", $"dy_pay_count" > 0)

msg.data:
tier: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [country: string, tier: string]
attr: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [player_id: string, source: string]
prof: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [player_id: string, register_platform: string, register_date: date, source: string, country: string, tier: string, is_us: boolean, register_time: timestamp]
pay: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [player_id: string, register_platform: string, register_date: date, source: string, country: string, tier: string, is_us: boolean, create_time: timestamp, days_in_game: int, order_item_id: string, eur_netto: double]
payGrp: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [player_id: string, register_platform: string, register_date: date, source: string, country: string, tier: string, is_us: boolean, dx_pay_count: bigint, dy_pay_count: bigint, dx_payer: boolean, dy_payer: boolean]

x: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [player_id: string, register_platform: string, register_date: date, source: string, country: string, tier: string, is_us: boolean, dx_pay_count: bigint, dy_pay_count: bigint, dx_payer: boolean, dy_payer: boolean]
